name: Quitclaim deeds
text: [§201H-22]  Quitclaim deeds.  Unless otherwise provided by law, the corporation shall issue quitclaim deeds and leases whenever it conveys, transfers, sells, or assigns any property developed, constructed, or sponsored under this chapter. [L 2005, c 196, pt of §20; am L 2006, c 180, §15]
